casebody.data:
Henry FLOMO
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 4, 2017

Erica A. Barber, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Sarah Hanna, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Henry Flomo's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 169 Conn.App. 266, 149 A.3d 185 (2016), is denied.
